**Play Music**:
Plays the song of your choice
`;play <song>`
**Join vc**:
The bot joins your current vc
`;join`
**Leave vc**:
The bot clears the queue and leaves your vc
`;leave`
**Queue**:
Shows all the music queued to the bot
`;queue`
**Remove song**:
Removes the song from queue at a specified index
`;remove <index>`
**Volume**:
Changes the volume of the song at a specified value
`;volume <number>`
